## Ask

Changed text for identifying.

## Prepare

Data was download from Lithuanian National website https://www.lb.lt/en/export-and-import-of-services-by-country as excel file. It can be found on blog's Github repo. Data was loaded using `tidyverse` library and was processed using `data.table` library.

```{r}
#| warning: false
# load libraries
library(readxl)
library(data.table)

# read data from excel
dt <- read_excel("lb_data.xlsx", sheet = 1, range = "A13:AN201")

# convert to data.table object
dt <- data.table(dt)

# rename columns for convinience
setnames(dt, c("...1"), "Type")

# shift columns to get correct names
dt[, Country := rep(dt[seq(1, nrow(dt), 4), Type], each = 4)]
dt <- dt[!(seq(1, nrow(dt), 4))]

# generate table with first few rows and columns
knitr::kable(dt[1:6, c(41, 1, 2, 3, 4)])
```
